definition: swaddling clothes/fig. early stage of development/infancy
cloth for carrying baby on back
string of copper coins/variant of 襁[qiang3]
cloth for carrying baby on back

sentences.english: I was nursed in swaddling clothes, and with great cares.
sentences.chinese: 我在襁褓中，受了母亲的抚育和照顾。

sentences.english: Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes lying in a manger.
sentences.chinese: 你要去寻找一个包在襁褓里，躺在马槽内的婴儿。

sentences.english: Maybe I was the descendant of a baby who was found wrapped in vines.
sentences.chinese: 可能我是襁褓中发现的婴儿的后裔呢。

sentences.english: The government, it said, should free citizens from their “swaddling clothes”.
sentences.chinese: 政府应当让市民走出襁褓。

sentences.english: The nurse picked up my baby girl from the hammock and left the room.
sentences.chinese: 那护士从床上抱起我那襁褓中的女儿，离开了房间。

sentences.english: I have a dream that one day i will grow back into a naive baby. Nestled in your mummy's arms.
sentences.chinese: 我梦想着自己变成一个襁褓中的婴儿，不愿曾经沧海。

sentences.english: Domestic tourism was also in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 当时中国的国内旅游仍处在襁褓之中。

sentences.english: Gods be good, our Lord Commander's still in swaddling clothes.
sentences.chinese: 老天保佑，我们的总司令仍在襁褓当中。

sentences.english: A mother holding a pair of arms is still in its infancy in the Longfeng twins.
sentences.chinese: 一位母亲怀里抱着一对尚在襁褓中的龙凤双胞胎。

sentences.english: It has been in the seedlings of swaddling clothes look forward to for a long time, finally his head.
sentences.chinese: 它已在禾苗的襁褓中期待了许久，终于露出了头。

sentences.english: Yachting in China is still in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 游艇业在中国仍然处于襁褓之中。

sentences.english: Shifu found him as a cub.

definition: undergarment covering the chest and abdomen
to learn to walk/(fig.) to learn sth, making unsteady progress/to get started on the learning curve
